Mattmax (amụrụ Matthew Abiodun Aina ) bụ onye nduzi vidio egwu Naịjirịa, onye na-ese ihe nkiri, onye nduzi azụmahịa, na onye na-eme ihe nkiri
Mattmax bụ onye isi na onye nwe Mattmax Productions. O deela ma duzie vidiyo egwu maka ọtụtụ ndị na-ati egwu n'ọtụtụ ụdị nke gụnyere Timaya, Terry G, Olamide, Burna Boy, J
Martins, Dj Xclusive, Dj Spinall, Omawumi, na Waje
A mụrụ ya nye nne na nna Ndị Kraịst ma kpọọ ya Matthew Abiodun Aina, Mattmax gụrụ na Sayensị Kọmputa na Yaba College of Technology, Lagos
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ na mahadum, ọ mụrụ mmetụta anya na ịntanetị

Dị ka o si kwuo, "Ihe niile m maara taa bụ nkuzi m kuziri onwe m, ịsụ ngọngọ na ịntanetị ebe a na ebe ahụ." Mattmax lụrụ Eniola Adeola Aina nke Dartistebyawele ma na-aga Cathedral Church Of Christ, Lagos.

Mgbe otu afọ nke ọmụmụ onwe onye siri ike, onye na-eti egwu bụ Slim Joe bịakwutere Mattmax iji duzie vidiyo egwu maka egwu ya, "O ti yanyan". Vidio ahụ karịrị atụmanya Slim Joe wee bụrụ ihe a ma ama. Mgbe ọ hụrụ ọrụ ya na TV, Mattmax kpebiri na ọ gaghị akwụsị

Ka ọtụtụ afọ gachara, ọ sere Olamide "Voice of the street" na D Banj "Don't tell me nonsense", na-etinye ya n'ebe a ma ama. Vidio ya enwetala ọtụtụ nhọpụta na onyinye, nke gụnyere nhọpụta asaa na Nigerian Music and Video Awards.  Mattmax na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nye ndị na-agu egwu n'ụdị dị iche iche, dị ka Burna Boy na Timaya E depụtara Mattmax dị ka otu n'ime ndị isi vidio egwu iri kachasị elu na Naijiria site na blọọgụ Naijaloaded.
